attributes.action: Stop Isis fighters returning to Britain and getting housed.
attributes.additional_details: Many law abiding citizens are homeless here .And to suggest that the government  would let an Isis fighter return and be housed is unthinkable..These ppl are cold hearted brutal murderers there is no excuse whatsoever  to put us the public in danger..
attributes.background: Anyone that has left this country to fight with Isis is clearly sick and dangerous,to suggest that they can be reformed is ludicrous.The government has suggested they will rehouse fighters returning to keep them sweet ,we as British ppl will not tolerate this you are putting us in danger..
